description: An Insulated zip-on skirt<br><br>This Insulated zip-on skirt (218g W/M) is made to provide easily accessible warmth during mountaineering and ski touring, and it will work great as insulation for all other outdoor activities.<br><br>They use Aero Downproof face fabric because of its windproofness and ability to keep insulation in place without leakage. They use thermo as insulation because of its warmth-to- weight ratio, warmth when wet and ability to provide warmth when compressed.<br><br>The Aero Downproof face fabric is 100% recycled nylon (39 g/m²). The front half of the skirt is filled with Thermo40 insulation (40 g/m²) and the back of the skirt is filled with thermo80 insulation (80 g/m2). Both are made with 100% recycled polyester.<br><br>Key features include: An elasticated waist with tightening, two zippered hand pockets, a zipped gusset for increased movability, full zip-on solution to easily put on and off.<br><br>This skirt has a regular fit that is slightly longer in the back.
name: Falketind Thermo80 Skirt
